item.title: MSCI 中国股票指数将进入技术性修正阶段
item.description: 在中国最高领导人于 7 月份召开会议之前，交易员们努力寻找催化剂，因此摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：MSCI Inc.’s key gauge for Chinese stocks is on course for a technical correction as traders struggle to find catalysts ahead of a July meeting of the nation’s top leaders.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 2024 年第三季度值得关注的 10 家公司
item.description: Bloomberg Intelligence 的分析师从数千家上市公司中筛选出少数几家公司，重点推荐给投资者。【原文：Analysts at Bloomberg Intelligence have sifted through thousands of publicly traded companies to highlight a select few for investors.】

item.title: 交易员提高对澳大利亚央行加息的押注，澳大利亚债券下滑
item.description: 由于市场加大了对澳大利亚央行再次加息的押注，对政策敏感的澳大利亚债券跌至七个月来的最低点。【原文：Policy-sensitive Australian bonds have slumped to their lowest in seven months as markets increased bets on another interest-rate hike by the central bank.】

item.title: 摩洛哥大旱是全球粮食供应的凶兆
item.description:
该国持续干旱，小麦进口量创下历史新高，水果和蔬菜的海外销售也面临风险。【原文：

The nation’s unrelenting dry spell is ushering in record wheat imports and risking fruit and vegetable sales abroad.

】

item.title: 夏季达沃斯 "凸显企业对全球关税的担忧
item.description: 在本周于中国举行的夏季达沃斯会议上，全球贸易关税成为与会者关注的焦点，各公司都在重新思考自己的战略，以缓解中西方紧张关系带来的影响。【原文：Global trade tariffs were top of mind for attendees at the event known as Summer Davos in China this week, with companies rethinking their strategies to mitigate the impact of tensions between China and the West.】

item.title: 摩根大通称美联储压力测试结果比自己的估计更乐观
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. said a Federal Reserve stress test of the bank’s strength in a hypothetical economic downturn was more optimistic on one key measure than the firm’s own projection.】

item.title: Gaw Capital 寻求从合作伙伴手中购买香港楼宇股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，总部位于香港的私募股权公司 Gaw Capital Partners 正寻求从合作伙伴恒力投资控股（集团）有限公司手中获得两座香港写字楼的全部所有权。【原文：Hong Kong-based private equity firm Gaw Capital Partners is seeking to take full ownership of two Hong Kong office buildings from partner Hengli Investments Holding (Group) Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度市场热点：阿达尼大力发展水泥业务，促进小型企业发展
西太平洋银行行长警告澳大利亚物价坚挺带来的经济风险
item.description: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行（Westpac Banking Corp.【原文：The chief of Westpac Banking Corp. said Australia’s economy is battling with the so-called last mile of returning inflation to the Reserve Bank’s target, a day after monthly consumer-price data showed an unexpected spike.】

item.title: 风险上升，韩国计划设立基金保障供应链安全
item.description: 韩国计划启动一项 5 万亿韩元（约合 36 亿美元）的基金，以减少对外国供应的依赖，同时寻求保障因地缘政治紧张局势而日益中断的供应链。【原文：South Korea plans to launch a 5 trillion won ($3.6 billion) fund to reduce its dependence on foreign supplies as it seeks to safeguard supply chains that have been increasingly disrupted by geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 亚洲发行商在今年最繁忙的一周售出 140 亿美元债券
item.description: 本周，亚太地区企业和政府在一级市场上出售的美元债券创下了九个月来的新高，因为发行人希望在利差进一步攀升之前锁定历史性的紧缩利差。【原文：Asia Pacific companies and governments’ sales of dollar bonds in the primary market hit a nine-month high this week, as issuers look to lock in historically tight spreads before they climb further.】

item.title: 中国商品生产者首当其冲受经济低迷影响
item.description: 大宗商品生产商是中国表现最差的工业企业，因为植根于旧经济的国有企业在疲软的经济中首当其冲。【原文：Commodities producers are China’s worst-performing industrial firms, as state-owned enterprises rooted in the old economy bear the brunt of a sluggish economy.】

item.title: 日元创下 1986 年以来最低点后，日本财务大臣再次发出警告
item.description: 日本财务大臣铃木俊一在日元对美元汇率跌至 1986 年以来的最低水平后对记者说，日本将采取必要的适当行动来保护本国货币，同时警惕突然的、片面的举动。【原文：Japan will take appropriate action as needed to defend its currency as it watches out for sudden, one-sided moves, Finance Minister Shunichi Suzuki told reporters after the yen slid to the lowest level versus the dollar since 1986.】

item.title: 红头文件可能绊倒热衷于印度债务市场的全球基金
item.description: 印度 1.3 万亿美元的主权债务市场已成为吸引全球投资者的磁石。然而，这种新发现的兴趣凸显了外来者在这个世界上人口最多的国家做生意是多么困难。【原文：India’s $1.3 trillion sovereign debt market has become a magnet for global investors. However, this newfound interest highlights how difficult doing business in the world’s most populous country can be for outsiders.】

item.title: 伦敦金属交易所寻求在香港设立仓库
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所正在探讨在香港建立首个金属交割仓库，以加强在亚洲的服务。【原文：The London Metal Exchange is exploring setting up its first warehouse in Hong Kong for metals delivery as it seeks to strengthen services across Asia.】

item.title: 卡塔尔航空公司洽谈收购维珍澳大利亚航空公司 20% 的股份
item.description: 卡塔尔航空公司（Qatar Airways）正在洽谈收购维珍澳大利亚航空公司（Virgin Australia Airlines Pty）约 20% 的股份，熟悉内情的人士称，这笔交易将使这家海湾航空公司进入一个其扩张计划去年被政府挫败的市场。【原文：Qatar Airways is in talks to acquire about 20% of Virgin Australia Airlines Pty, people familiar with the matter said, a deal that would grant the Gulf carrier access to a market where its expansion plans were scuppered by the government last year.】

item.title: L Catterton 集团通过出售 Birkenstock 股份融资 7.56 亿美元
item.description: 私募股权公司 L Catterton 和 Birkenstock Holding Plc 的一批员工周三通过出售这家在美国上市的鞋类制造商的一批股票筹集了 7.56 亿美元。【原文：Private equity firm L Catterton and a group of employees of Birkenstock Holding Plc raised $756 million on Wednesday from the sale of a block of shares of the US-traded footwear maker.】

item.title: 图表显示，干预威胁将导致日元大幅波动
item.description: 日元汇率跌至 1986 年以来的最低点，引发了日本干预的担忧，市场对日元波动性大幅增加感到不安。【原文：The market is jittery about a big increase in volatility in the yen as a slump in the currency to the lowest since 1986 raises the specter of Japanese intervention.】

item.title: 明报》称中国将提高访港旅客免税限额
item.description: 据周四的一份报纸报道，中国游客将很快获准在香港进行更多免税购物，中国政府将把购买限额提高多达六倍，以帮助提振香港疲软的零售业。【原文：Chinese tourists will soon be allowed more duty-free shopping in Hong Kong, with Beijing set to raise the purchasing limit by up to sixfold to help boost the city’s sluggish retail sector, according to a newspaper report on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国金融精英面临 40 万美元薪酬上限和奖金扣减
item.description: 中国金融家的高薪时代很快就要结束了，因为中国金融业的一些大公司为配合习近平主席的 "共同富裕 "运动而实施了严格的新限制。【原文：The era of big paychecks for Chinese financiers is fast coming to an end as some of the industry’s biggest companies impose strict new limits to comply with President Xi Jinping’s “common prosperity” campaign.】

item.title: 印度金融家债务吸引买家，利差为 2020 年以来最宽
item.description: 印度的影子贷款机构正在吸引该国一些最大的基金经理，因为他们的票据比主权债券提供了近四年来最大的溢价。【原文：Indian shadow lenders are luring some of the nation’s biggest fund managers as their notes offer the biggest premium in nearly four years over sovereign bonds.】

item.title: 银行家和律师二人组通过大胆的天然气赌注赚取数十亿美元
item.description:
Venture Global公司的创始人站在美国天然气出口热潮的最前沿，而这一热潮现在正受到质疑。【原文：

The founders of Venture Global stand at the forefront of a US natural gas export boom that’s now in question.

】

item.title: 受美国加息和美元走强影响，亚洲货币跌至 2022 年低点
item.description: 亚洲货币跌至 19 个多月来的最弱水平，因为交易员们正努力应对美国利率长期走高的前景和美元的重新崛起。【原文：Asian currencies slumped to their weakest in more than 19 months as traders grappled with the prospect of higher-for-longer US interest rates and the resurgent dollar.】

item.title: 前 Two Sigma 研究员成为中国量化地震的大赢家
item.description: 由 Two Sigma Investments LP 校友创办的一家中国对冲基金正在成为今年 1.6 万亿元人民币（合 2,200 亿美元）行业洗牌的最大赢家之一。【原文：A Chinese hedge fund founded by a Two Sigma Investments LP alumnus is emerging as one of the biggest winners from this year’s shakeup of the 1.6 trillion yuan ($220 billion) industry.】

item.title: SM 能源公司即将以 30 亿美元收购 XCL 资源公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，SM 能源公司正在就收购犹他州顶级油气生产商 XCL 资源公司进行深入谈判。【原文：SM Energy is in advanced talks to acquire XCL Resources, a top oil and gas producer in Utah, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印尼对印度的债券折价因财政问题而回归
item.description: 由于担心即将上任的政府会采取相对宽松的财政政策，印尼债券的表现不如印度的高收益债券。【原文：Indonesia’s bonds are underperforming their high-yielding Indian peers on concern over the incoming government’s relatively lax fiscal policies.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好美股继续上涨。日元继续暴跌，现实严峻。贝莱德进一步进军私人市场。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US stocks just keep rising. A grim reality sets as yen continues its plunge. BlackRock expands further into private markets. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 美国库存大幅增加后，石油窄幅震荡
item.description: 周三，随着股市的波动和美国原油库存的大幅增加，原油盘中表现平稳。【原文：Oil was steady after a choppy session on Wednesday following volatility in equity markets and a large build in US crude stockpiles.】

item.title: Suzano 放弃收购国际纸业
item.description: Suzano SA 终止了对国际纸业公司（International Paper Co.【原文：Suzano SA ended its pursuit of an acquisition of International Paper Co., which rejected its overtures in favor of its own merger plans with another rival.】
